name: Dead Warrior Tribute
description:
"Dead Warrior Tribute" is a challenging beat em up game for fans of the genre! Kill enemies and use rolls to avoid damage. Experience points will heal you, but will make the game harder.

This is an endless story about a resurrected skeleton warrior. Even after his death, he is forced to fight for existance with countless hordes of enemies that will attack his cemetery. Hell crows, dead knights, and black giants stood in the way of peace. They are outnumbered, but how far can you go in this unequal fight? Each kill will heal you, but also summon new opponents to the battlefield. Be careful and use the rolls to avoid getting hit!

Game features:
  • Endless gameplay! How far can you go?
  • Old school graphics
  • Awesome pixel art graphics
  • Steam achievements support
